bill.title: County elected officials; increase salaries of.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 25-3-3, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The Salaries Of The Tax Assessors And Collectors By 16%; To Amend Section 25-3-13, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To The Boards Of Supervisors By 16%; To Amend Section 25-3-36, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The Salaries Of Every Justice Court Judge By 16%; To Amend Section 25-3-25, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The Salaries Of Sheriffs By 16%; To Amend Section 41-61-59, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The Salaries Of The Chief County Medical Examiner And Chief County Medical Examiner Investigator; To Amend Section 9-1-43, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The Salaries Of Chancery And Circuit Clerks; To Amend Section 9-13-19, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The Salaries Of Chancery And Circuit Clerks; To Amend Section 19-25-31, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The Compensation Paid To Riding Bailiffs; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Fees and Salaries of Public Officers;Appropriations
